arch_importfiles.help_text: Import multiple files into the archive

arch_importdir.help_text: Import a directory and all its contents into the archive

arch_buildarchive.help_text: Build archive from the current directory

arch_texeditor.help_text: Open the texture editor for the current archive

arch_clean_patches.help_text: Remove any unused patches, and their associated entries

arch_clean_zdoom_textures.help_text: Remove any unused textures, flats, and patches in a ZDoom archive.

arch_check_zdoom_texture_duplicates.help_text: Checks the archive for any duplicate textures/flats/texture definitions in a ZDoom archive.

arch_check_zdoom_patch_duplicates.help_text: Checks the archive for any duplicate patches and patch table entries in a ZDoom archive.

arch_check_duplicates.help_text: Checks the archive for any entries sharing the same name

arch_check_duplicates2.help_text: Checks the archive for any entries sharing the same data

arch_clean_iwaddupes.help_text: Remove entries that are exact duplicates of entries from the base resource archive

arch_check_iwadoverrides.help_text: Checks entries of the same name from the base resource archive. Also checks texture definitions. This helps know what your archive overrides.

arch_check_zdoomiwadtexoverrides.text: Check ZDoom Texture Entries Overridden from IWAD
arch_check_zdoomiwadtexoverrides.help_text: This finds what Zdoom textures your archive overrides from the iwad. Since this is for zdoom, it checks across flats, patches, and other assets. The Check Entries Overridden from IWAD tool checks general overrides.

arch_replace_maps.help_text: Tool to find and replace thing types, specials and textures in all maps

arch_entry_save.help_text: Save any changes to the current entry

arch_entry_rename_each.help_text: Rename separately all the selected entries

arch_entry_revert.help_text: Revert any modifications made to the selected entries since the last save

arch_entry_sort.help_text: Sort the selected entries in the list, or all entries if only one is selected

arch_entry_import.help_text: Import a file to the selected entry

arch_entry_export.help_text: Export the selected entries to files

arch_entry_bookmark.help_text: Toggle bookmark on the current entry

arch_entry_opentab.help_text: Open selected entries in separate tabs

arch_entry_crc32.help_text: Compute the CRC-32 checksums of the selected entries

arch_entry_setup_external.help_text: Open the preferences dialog to set up external editors

arch_bas_convertb.help_text: Convert any selected SWITCHES and ANIMATED entries to a single SWANTBLS entry

arch_bas_convertz.help_text: Convert any selected SWITCHES and ANIMATED entries to a single ANIMDEFS entry

arch_swan_convert.help_text: Convert SWANTBLS entries into SWITCHES and ANIMATED entries

arch_texturex_convertzd.help_text: Convert any selected TEXTUREx entries to ZDoom TEXTURES format

arch_texturex_finderrors.help_text: Log to the console any error detected in the TEXTUREx entries

arch_texture_clean_iwaddupes.text: Remove Texture Entries Duplicated from IWAD
arch_texture_clean_iwaddupes.help_text: Remove Texture entries that are exact duplicates of entries from the base resource archive

arch_zdtextures_clean_singlepatch.help_text: Removes ZDoom TEXTURES entries that are just a single patch

arch_view_text.help_text: Open the selected entry in the text editor, regardless of type

arch_view_hex.help_text: Open the selected entry in the hex editor, regardless of type

arch_gfx_convert.help_text: Open the Gfx Conversion Dialog for any selected gfx entries

arch_gfx_translate.help_text: Remap a range of colours in the selected gfx entries to another range (paletted gfx only)

arch_gfx_tint.help_text: Tint the selected gfx entries by a colour/amount

arch_gfx_offsets.help_text: Mass-modify the offsets for any selected gfx entries

arch_gfx_addptable.help_text: Add selected gfx entries to PNAMES

arch_gfx_addtexturex.help_text: Create textures from selected gfx entries and add them to TEXTUREx

arch_gfx_exportpng.help_text: Export selected gfx entries to PNG format files

arch_gfx_offsetpaste.help_text: Paste previously copied offsets to the selected gfx entries

arch_audio_convertwd.help_text: Convert any selected WAV format entries to Doom Sound format

arch_audio_convertdw.help_text: Convert any selected Doom Sound format entries to WAV format

arch_audio_convertmus.help_text: Convert any selected MUS format entries to MIDI format

arch_scripts_compiledecohack.help_text: Compile any selected DECOHack text entries to DeHackEd

arch_scripts_compileacs.help_text: Compile any selected text entries to ACS bytecode

arch_scripts_compilehacs.help_text: Compile any selected text entries to Hexen-compatible ACS bytecode

arch_map_opendb2.help_text: Open the selected map in Doom Builder 2

arch_quick_run.help_text: Run the current archive without opening the configuration dialog

arch_elist_updir.help_text: Go up to the parent directory

arch_elist_homedir.help_text: Go up to the home (root) directory
